data.title: Sharepoint Online all document library webpart titles have changed overnight
data.meta_description: I noticed this morning that all of my SharePoint online document library webpart title\descriptions have all changed overnight. This is effecting hundreds of pages. Now the title is displaying the root folder title. When…
data.text:
I noticed this morning that all of my SharePoint online document library webpart title\descriptions have all changed overnight. This is effecting hundreds of pages. Now the title is displaying the root folder title. When these webparts were created we entered the description manually. How does something like this happen and can it be reverted?

my first thought would be concern about malware \ ransomware on your network.

Do you backup your sharepoint?
